review: This game triggers me.эта игра возмущает меня

'Drop the rock'That was the first thing I heard when I loaded into a game of Rust. When I turned around I saw a man aiming a water pipe shotgun to my head. He repeated himself, 'Drop the rock', this time strengthening the 'Rock'. I slowly went to my inventory and drop the rock. He then shot me in the foot leaving me to bleed out.

Fun and challenging game! I loved the laser room concept. Just a little note that the tiger might be a little too hard to pass. The lighting on the mansion is amazing. I loved the heist! This game is very clever and-  I quit.
BEST GAME EVER! YOU CAN WANK OFF A PERSON, YOU CAN TAKE IT IN THE BUTT. GAY SEX/10
